Text: Many parasitic diseases caused by roundworms result from poor personal hygiene. Contributing factors may include lack of a clean water supply, inadequate sanitation measures, crowded living conditions, combined with a lack of access to health care and low levels of education.

Text: Neptune, shown in Figure 1.1, is the only major planet that cant be seen from Earth without a telescope. Cause: Uranus did not always appear exactly where it should appear .
Effect: Scientists predicted the existence of Neptune before it was discovered

Text: In addition, boys generally start puberty later than girls, so they have a longer period of childhood growth. For all these reasons, by the end of puberty, the average height of boys is 10 centimeters (about 4 inches) greater than the average height of girls.

Text: Climate zones are classified by the Kppen classification system. This system is based on the temperature, the amount of precipitation, and the times of year when precipitation occurs. Text: A model that can successfully predict the present is more likely to be accurate when predicting the future. Text: As wind or an ocean current moves, the Earth spins underneath it. As a result, an object moving north or south along the Earth will appear to move in a curve instead of in a straight line. Cause: As wind or an ocean current moves , the Earth spins underneath it
Effect: an object moving north or south along the Earth will appear to move in a curve instead of in a straight line .

Text: The atomic number of an element is usually written in front of and slightly below the elements symbol, like in the Figure 1.2 for helium.
